#summary Quick reference to AVR-Assembler
#labels Phase-Implementation,Draft

For more details check the [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/resources/prod_documents/doc0856.pdf AVR Assembler Instruction Set]

|| *Instruction* || *Syntax* || *Category* || *Description* ||
|| mov || {{{mov reg_t, reg_s}}} || General || =Move; Copy the contents of register *reg_s* to register *reg_t* ||
|| A Test ||
|| ldi || {{{ldi reg, const}}} || General || =LoadImmediate; Push the value of *const* into the register *reg*  ||
|| out || {{{out port, reg}}} || I/O || Write data containing in *reg* to ioport *port*||
|| in || {{{in reg, port}}} || I/O || Read data from ioport *port* and push it into register *reg*||
